featured.text: Altogether he printed nearly 80 books, many being his own translations from the French. 37.

definition.zh_def: 翻譯是將一種語言的文字或口語內容轉換為另一種語言的過程。
definition.en_def: Translation is the process of converting text or spoken content from one language into another.
definition.example: The translation of the book made it accessible to a wider audience.
